si.title: ඇකඩමි විද්යාල සඳහා අයදුම්පත්
body_lines: සිසුන්ට ඊයේ සිට ඔවුන්ගේ අයදුම්පත් ඉදිරිපත් කළ හැකි බව අධ්යාපන අමාත්යාංශය පවසයි.
අයදුම්පත් භාරදීමේ කාලය ලබන මස 5 වන දින සිදුකරන බව අධ්යාපන අමාත්යාංශය ප්රකාශ කර තිබේ.. (ඒ)

en.title: Applications for academic colleges
body_lines: Applications have been requested for the admission of students to academic schools in accordance with the GCE A / L examination for 2021 and 2022.
Students can submit their applications from yesterday, the Ministry of Education said.
The Ministry of Education has stated that the time for submission of applications will be completed on the 5th of next month.. (A)

summary_lines: Academic colleges are accepting applications for 2021 and 2022 GCE A/L exams, starting from yesterday, with a deadline on the 5th of next month.
